title: Very good score still no S?

replies.body: Yasuo is of the easiest chamions to farm kills with, its nothing impressive to stomp normal games with a great score as yasuo(or an assassin in general)
CS is a huge deal for your grade.

The grading system compares your ez yas in that role versus other currently regiested best yas, so you can easily get an s- in the jg, sup, adc then it is to get it top and mid as that's probably where they are most found
cs,assist,kills,deaths.time.vision,objectives it all matters.
If you want an S you NEED good CS, also you NEED good vision score
